sanskrit_verse:
सर्षपाः षट् यवो मध्यस्त्रियवं त्वेककृष्णलम् ।
पञ्चकृष्णलको माषस्ते सुवर्णस्तु षोडश ॥ ८.१३४॥
transliteration:
sarṣapāḥ ṣaṭ yavo madhyastriyavaṃ tvekakṛṣṇalam |
pañcakṛṣṇalako māṣaste suvarṇastu ṣoḍaśa ||
sph_interpretive_translation: Six mustard seeds equal one barley grain; three barley grains equal one black gram; five black grams equal one lentil; sixteen lentils equal one gold unit.
